DataElement.preferredName: Enzyme-linked Immunosorbent Spot Assay Total Minus BKG Antigen Result Cell Count Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value representing the total number of cells incubated with antigen minus the value for Bkg incubated wells.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Enzyme-linked Immunosorbent Spot Assay Total Minus BKG Antigen Result
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A highly sensitive immunoassay capable of detecting secreted materials from individual cells upon activation. If the material of interest is secreted in response to a particular stimulus, then the material will bind to a specific immobilized antibody. Binding is then verified and visualized by applying other antibodies that have been tagged in some way.Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._The act of removing a part from the whole._The non-affirmative response to a question._Any substance, generally a protein, that stimulates the immune system and elicits an immune response.  Recognition by the immune system elicits either a T-lymphocyte response, recognizing processed antigens, or a B-lymphocyte response, producing antibodies that bind to unprocessed antigens._The result of an action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A highly sensitive immunoassay capable of detecting secreted materials from individual cells upon activation. If the material of interest is secreted in response to a particular stimulus, then the material will bind to a specific immobilized antibody. Binding is then verified and visualized by applying other antibodies that have been tagged in some way.

Concepts.definition: A highly sensitive immunoassay capable of detecting secreted materials from individual cells upon activation. If the material of interest is secreted in response to a particular stimulus, then the material will bind to a specific immobilized antibody. Binding is then verified and visualized by applying other antibodies that have been tagged in some way.

Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:The act of removing a part from the whole.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Any substance, generally a protein, that stimulates the immune system and elicits an immune response.  Recognition by the immune system elicits either a T-lymphocyte response, recognizing processed antigens, or a B-lymphocyte response, producing antibodies that bind to unprocessed antigens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
The act of removing a part from the whole.
The non-affirmative response to a question.

Any substance, generally a protein, that stimulates the immune system and elicits an immune response.  Recognition by the immune system elicits either a T-lymphocyte response, recognizing processed antigens, or a B-lymphocyte response, producing antibodies that bind to unprocessed antigens.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The total number of cells counted.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Duke University trial; Versioned to support increase of max value length from 4 to 6; 02.19.18; ghd
